name: Carson Valley Inn Amenities
description: Carson Valley Inn offers a comprehensive amenities package that makes it an ideal base for golf groups exploring the Carson Valley region. Facilities include an indoor pool shaped like the state of Nevada, two 6-person glass-enclosed hot spas, a fitness center with mountain views, RV park with 59 full-hookup sites, and three dining options including CV Steak and Katie's Country Kitchen (24-hour). Free WiFi, free parking, no resort fees, and a Tesla charging station round out the guest amenities.
shortDescription: Full resort amenities at Carson Valley Inn: indoor pool, hot spas, dining, and no resort fees.

faqs.question: What amenities does Carson Valley Inn offer?
faqs.answer: Outdoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, casino, multiple restaurants, wedding chapel, and RV park.

faqs.question: Which golf courses are nearby?
faqs.answer: Genoa Lakes, Eagle Valley, Dayton Valley, and Toiyabe are all within 15-30 minutes.

faqs.question: Is the pool open year-round?
faqs.answer: The outdoor pool operates seasonally during warmer months, while the hot tub is available longer.
